description: "An early 19th century map of Singapore’s southern coast and islands, with bathymetry (sea depth), shoals and reefs, anchor points, and notes to aid navigation. The roads and main buildings of Singapore city are also shown."
title: "Singapore harbours and roads with the adjacent channels / cheifly from the surveys of Captn. Daniel Ross of the Bombay Marine, 1827 ; J. & C. Walker, sculpt."
